entry.title: About
entry.summary: Brief description of the project: rules, mission, etc
entry.content:
Hello, I'm really happy that you have interest in Sublides. The mission of this project is to have fun and develop the world. Right now I just want to share some stories describing it.

I'm thrilled to see it's growth with you and the world.

How will it work:

#TODO: I don't know yet. WIP.
